name: Looking for a Cat
description:
This is a Demo-Level!

Looking for a cat is a 2D platformer in which you venture through space in order to find a special cat. With this demo of our game we wanted to try out what we can do and put our ideas to the test. We would love for you to give it a try and tell us your thoughts about the game!

-B & J from WeirdColors

Special thanks to: 

-Vexed (v3x3d.itch.io) for the font "Scrambled Eggs"

-Penusbmic (penusbmic.itch.io) for the sprites of "the Merchant"

-Jesse Munguia (jesse-m.itch.io) for the sprites of "the Skeleton"

-0x72 (0x72.itch.io) for the sprites of various platforms through the "industrial.v2" asset pack
